      • getFilterSyntax

        public java.util.Map<Filter.FilterCondition,java.util.function.BiFunction<java.lang.String,java.lang.String,java.lang.String>> getFilterSyntax()
        Description copied from interface: DatabaseProvider
        Each Filter.FilterCondition must be translated to a DB-specific expression. The map returned by this function contains a (String,String)-to-String function for each condition. Each of those functions converts the column and condition value into an expression implementing the filter. Helper methods like DatabaseProvider.escapeInfinity(String), DatabaseProvider.escapeLikeExpr(String) must be properly implemented.
        Specified by:
        getFilterSyntax in interface DatabaseProvider
        Returns:
